alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Jasper; Madison; Polk; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 19 at 2:37PM CDT until August 19 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR POLK...NORTHEASTERN MADISON...SOUTHWESTERN JASPER...SOUTHEASTERN DALLAS AND NORTHWESTERN WARREN COUNTIES... At 236 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Valley West Mall, or over Clive, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Valley West Mall and Walnut Woods State Park around 240 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Johnston, Windsor Heights, Merle Hay Mall, Norwalk, Des Moines Int`l Airport, Drake Stadium And Knapp Center, Saylorville, Iowa Events Center, Principal Park, Southridge Mall, Des Moines, Margo Frankel Woods State Park, Ankeny, Pleasant Hill, Carlisle, Iowa State Fairgrounds, Weh-Weh-Neh-Kee State Park and Ankeny Regional Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 66 and 72, and between mile markers 87 and 93. Interstate 80 between mile markers 116 and 154. Interstate 235 between mile markers 1 and 14. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
